info.title: FDK-> Cross Chain
info.description: This is the Aarc's Fund Deposit Kit API for cross-chain transactions.

get.description: To get the tokens supported on the provided chainId.

parameters.name: isShortList
parameters.description: If `true` then provide the top cross chain transferred tokens.

get.description: Adds an item to the system
To get the available routes for the cross-chain transfers.

parameters.name: fromChainId
parameters.description: chain Id of the source network

parameters.name: toChainId
parameters.description: chain Id of the destination network

parameters.name: routeType
parameters.description: This defines the type of route to fetch.`RouteType.Value`, which will return max output on destination. `RouteType.Output`, which has the fastest time to transfer tokens.`RouteType.Gas`, which is going to incur the least gas.

get.description: Check the allowance to an address to spend an asset of another address.
To get the status of the cross-chain transaction.

parameters.name: transactionHash
parameters.description: transaction hash of the bridge transaction

parameters.name: fromChainId
parameters.description: chain Id of the source network

parameters.name: toChainId
parameters.description: chain Id of the destination network

get.description: Get the balances of all the assets on all the chains of an address.

post.description: Get the Route Txn data for the quote selected by the user.
